adjective.description: Chiefly Entomology and Botany. Flattened, occurring in or forming a flat plane, planar.

verb.description: To make level by erosion. Chiefly in pass.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in The Century Dictionary. From plane + -ate<br>early 20th century; earliest use found in Geographical Journal. From plane + -ate.
